item.title: Oscars Reach Deal With YouTube
item.description: The Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences said it had reached a deal with YouTube for exclusive rights to the show starting in 2029.

item.title: National Center for Atmospheric Research to Be Dismantled, Trump Administration Says
item.description: Russell Vought, the White House budget director, called the laboratory a source of “climate alarmism.”

item.title: Video Footage Shows Nick Reiner Enter Store an Hour Before His Arrest
item.description: Mr. Reiner was filmed entering a gas station’s store in South Los Angeles to buy a sports drink roughly an hour before he was arrested by the police a...

item.title: The New Flu Variant Could Spread Widely This Year. Here’s What to Know.
item.description: Scientists have expressed alarm about the dominant version of the virus that’s circulating now.

item.title: Stabbing Near Chabad Headquarters Investigated as a Possible Hate Crime
item.description: A dispute on a Brooklyn street appeared to explode after the perpetrator made antisemitic statements, the police said.
